about.title: About
content: Hello and welcome to my portfolio website. My name is Ewelina Krzeptowska and I am a Computer Science student who is passionate about web development. I have experience in creating **full stack web applications** using various technologies and frameworks, such as **React**, **Node.js**, **MongoDB**, **Express**, **Bootstrap**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**. I enjoy learning new skills and exploring new challenges in the field of web development.

In this website, you can find some of the projects that I have worked on, as well as my resume and contact information. I am currently looking for a job as a full stack web developer, so feel free to reach out to me if you are interested in hiring me or collaborating with me. Thank you for visiting my website and I hope you enjoy it. 😊

contact.title: Contact
contact.message_too_long: Message is too long. Please limit your message to {{messageLimit}} characters.
contact.im_asleep: I may be asleep at this time, but I'll get back to you as soon as I can!
